short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scramble your search and browsing history

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Scrambler has been created as a Chrome extension to decrease accuracy of data collected in your browser's cookies. This is accomplished by running background queries whenever you run a search on Google. Through adding randomized activity to your online searches, information collected on your digital life is harder to obtain. Search Scrambler is a tool to protect yourself.
